name: Linda Durkin
testimonial: 'I wasn't sure if I would be challenged effectively but through well thought out and professonal workouts I feel stronger and am injury free'

name: Doris Mori
testimonial: 'I'm a former school adminsitrator and Thomas helped me gain confidnece in my movements by demonstrating and explaining the 'why' behind exercises. Because of our training sessions I have the agility and strength to keep traveling and doing the physical activities that I love.'

name: Hans Wang
testimonial: 'I truly learned a lot and I feel like I'm more prepared to lift weights the right way without being intimidated by all the equipment and other people there.'

name: Harry B. Rossiter, PhD, FACSM
testimonial: 'Thomas is passionate about helping others to live a better life. He has the practical and scientific knowledge, as well as the compassionate and approachable personality, to help all types of clients build lifelong health and fitness.'
